contentfulSermon.title: 40 Days in the Word: Week 1 - How Do You Build Your Life on the Bible?

fields.notesFormatted:
James 1:19-25

To build my life on the Bible...

  1. I receive it with my ears.

    Romans 10:17

    James 1:19-25

    For the best reception

    Quiet, Calm, Clean, Humble.

  2. Read it with my eyes.

    James 1:23-25

  3. I research it with my hand and my mouth.

    John 5:39

    Acts 17:11

  4. I review and remember with my mind.

    James 1:25

    Joshua 1:8

  5. I respond to it with my actions.

    James 1:22

    Matthew 7:24-27
